author: James Martin
method: Strip off the mint leaves, sprinkle with salt and chop finely. Place into a jug, add the sugar and pour over the boiling water, stir and leave to cool.  Stir in the vinegar and taste. Add more water or vinegar and adjust seasoning to suit your taste.
ingredients: bunch of mint,  pinch salt,  4 tbsp boiling water,  4 tbsp white wine vinegar ,  1 level tbsp caster sugar
